name: react-vis
author: Visualization Team <visualization@uber.com>
description: Data visualization library based on React and d3.

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist es bundle.* index.html && mkdir dist es
scripts.start: (cd showcase && command -v yarn >/dev/null && yarn && npm start || npm install && npm start)
scripts.build:browser: browserify src/index.js -t [ babelify ] --standalone reactVis | uglifyjs > dist/dist.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -d dist --copy-files && BABEL_ENV=es babel src -d es --copy-files && node-sass src/main.scss dist/style.css --output-style compressed && npm run build:browser
scripts.lint: eslint src tests showcase docs --ignore-pattern node_modules --ignore-pattern bundle.js
scripts.full-test: npm run lint && npm run cover
